channel.title: Fine dont worry!

item.title: Fine dont worry!
item.dc:creator: @BloodyRage BloodyRage
item.description:
@BloodyRage wrote:

client.java:18020: ‘catch’ without ‘try’
catch(Exception e) {
^
client.java:23336: illegal start of expression
public void ResetBonus() {
^
2 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

what have i gone wrong with here?

[code] }

public void WriteEnergy() {
	if (playerRights < 2 && playerEnergy > 100) {
		playerEnergy = 100;
	}
	sendFrame126(playerEnergy + "Rage Energy", 149);
}
public void appendPos() {
	try {
		sendQuest("X: "+absX+" Y: "+absY, 184);
		sendQuest("Your coordinates", 183);
	} catch(Exception e) { println_debug("Error"); {
}
public void ResetBonus() {
	for (int i = 0; i < playerBonus.length; i++) {
		playerBonus[i] = 0;
	}
}
public void GetBonus() {
	for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
		if (playerEquipment[i] > -1) {
			for (int j = 0; j < 9999; j++) {
				if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null){
						if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId == playerEquipment[i]) {
						for (int k = 0; k < playerBonus.length; k++) {
							playerBonus[k] += server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].Bonuses[k];
						}
						break;
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2007, 08:32:02 AM[/size][hr]Oh Forget it then, ill just start a brand new server.. Thanks for all the help.
